text: Mimvungu minsambanu miba vana mu diambu di lundilanga nlangu, mitulu vana boso bubela kifu ki Bayuda mu kukivedisanga2.6 KukivedisangaÂ : Bayuda baba kifu ki kukivedisanga tuamina badia, bu balembu dia ayi bu bamanisini dia. Nlangu wu kukivedisila wuba lundulungu mu mimvungu.. Mvungu wumosi wulenda kota nduka-nduka khatitsika yi dingungulu di nlangu.
